query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_oee_alert_config (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, target_type ENUM('device', 'machine', 'production_line', 'all') DEFAULT 'all', target_id INT, oee_warning_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 75.00, oee_critical_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 65.00, mttr_warning_minutes INT DEFAULT 60, mttr_critical_minutes INT DEFAULT 120, mtbf_warning_hours INT DEFAULT 100, mtbf_critical_hours INT DEFAULT 50, notify_email BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, notify_telegram BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, email_recipients JSON, check_interval_minutes INT DEFAULT 15, cooldown_minutes INT DEFAULT 30, last_check_at TIMESTAMP NULL, last_alert_at TIMESTAMP NULL, is_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_oee_alert_config (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, target_type ENUM('device', 'machine', 'production_line', 'all') DEFAULT 'all', target_id INT, oee_warning_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 75.00, oee_critical_threshold DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 65.00, mttr_warning_minutes INT DEFAULT 60, mttr_critical_minutes INT DEFAULT 120, mtbf_warning_hours INT DEFAULT 100, mtbf_critical_hours INT DEFAULT 50, notify_email BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, notify_telegram BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, email_recipients JSON, check_interval_minutes INT DEFAULT 15, cooldown_minutes INT DEFAULT 30, last_check_at TIMESTAMP NULL, last_alert_at TIMESTAMP NULL, is_enabled BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
